Radarr.description:
Radarr is a PVR for Movies on Usenet and Torrents.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/radarr, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/config.description: Choose a Share for Radarr Configuration Files
/config.label: Config Storage

/downloads.description: Choose a Share for Radarr Downloads
/downloads.label: Download Storage

/movies.description: Choose a Share for Radarr Media Library
/movies.label: Movies location

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run Radarr as.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Radarr as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run Radarr as.
